statements: SELECT wrestler_name FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE win_count > 10 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_duration FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE match_duration < INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY match_duration DESC, wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE win_count > loss_count ORDER BY win_count DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, finishing_moves FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(finishing_moves) > 0;
SELECT * FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE wrestler_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE win_count > 10 ORDER BY wrestler_name DESC, loss_count ASC
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name, win_count + loss_count AS total_matches FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE total_matches > 20 ORDER BY total_matches DESC
SELECT wrestler_name, finishing_moves FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE match_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count, match_duration FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE win_count > loss_count AND match_duration < INTERVAL '2 days'
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM WrestlerStatistics WHERE win_count > 5 OR loss_count > 5 ORDER BY win_count DESC
SELECT * FROM WrestlerMatches;
SELECT wrestler_id, opponent_id, result FROM WrestlerMatches WHERE match_duration > 10;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight, wrestler_height FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE wrestler_height > 180;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_birthdate, wrestler_weight FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE wrestler_weight > 200;
SELECT wrestler_name, opponent_id, finishing_move FROM WrestlerMatches WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT wrestler_id, opponent_id, result FROM WrestlerMatches WHERE match_duration > 10 ORDER BY wrestler_id ASC, opponent_id DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight, wrestler_height FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE wrestler_height > 180 ORDER BY wrestler_name DESC;
SELECT wrestler_id, opponent_id, result, finishing_move FROM WrestlerMatches WHERE result = 'WIN' AND match_duration < 20 ORDER BY wrestler_id DESC, opponent_id ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight, wrestler_height FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE wrestler_weight BETWEEN 200 AND 250 ORDER BY wrestler_weight ASC, wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_birthdate FROM WrestlerDetails WHERE wrestler_birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count FROM wrestlers WHERE win_count > 10;
SELECT wrestler_name, loss_count FROM wrestlers WHERE loss_count < 5;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestlers ORDER BY win_count DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, move_name FROM wrestlers JOIN finishing_moves ON wrestlers.wrestler_id = finishing_moves.wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestlers WHERE win_count > 10 ORDER BY win_count DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestlers WHERE loss_count < 5 ORDER BY loss_count ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestlers WHERE win_count > 5 AND loss_count > 2 ORDER BY wrestler_name;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestlers WHERE win_count = 0 OR loss_count = 0;

SELECT wrest.wrestler_name, fin.move_name, stat.match_duration FROM wrestlers AS wrest JOIN finishing_moves AS fin ON wrest.wrestler_id = fin.wrestler_id JOIN match_statistics AS stat ON wrest.wrestler_id = stat.wrestler_id WHERE stat.match_duration > '00:10:00' ORDER BY stat.match_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestler_stats;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count FROM wrestler_stats ORDER BY win_count DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, loss_count FROM wrestler_stats WHERE loss_count > 0;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestler_stats WHERE win_count >= 10 AND loss_count < 5;
SELECT wrestler_name, date, duration FROM wrestler_stats JOIN match_stats ON wrestler_stats.wrestler_id = match_stats.wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM wrestler_stats WHERE win_count > 10 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count FROM wrestler_stats WHERE wrestler_id = 1;

SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count, move_name FROM wrestler_stats INNER JOIN wrestler_moves ON wrestler_stats.wrestler_id = wrestler_moves.wrestler_id INNER JOIN finishing_moves ON wrestler_moves.move_id = finishing_moves.move_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, win_count, loss_count, duration FROM wrestler_stats LEFT JOIN match_stats ON wrestler_stats.wrestler_id = match_stats.wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_id, COUNT(match_id) AS match_count FROM match_stats GROUP BY wrestler_id HAVING match_count > 5 ORDER BY wrestler_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wrestler;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM wrestler WHERE height > 6.0;
SELECT wrestler1_id, wrestler2_id, winner_id FROM match ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT finisher_name, description FROM finishers WHERE wrestler_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM win_loss_record WHERE wins > losses;
SELECT name, weight_class, height FROM wrestler WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM match WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT wrestler.name, finishers.finisher_name, finishers.description FROM wrestler JOIN finishers ON wrestler.id = finishers.wrestler_id;

SELECT promotions.promotion_name, promotions.location, COUNT(wrestler.id) as total_wrestlers FROM promotions LEFT JOIN wrestler ON promotions.id = wrestler.promotion_id GROUP BY promotions.promotion_name;

SELECT wrestler.name, SUM(win_loss_record.wins) as total_wins, SUM(win_loss_record.losses) as total_losses FROM wrestler JOIN win_loss_record ON wrestler.id = win_loss_record.wrestler_id GROUP BY wrestler.name HAVING total_wins > total_losses;
